title: Metal.Gear.Rising.Revengeance.PS3.All.DLC-1X1
description:
Metal Gear Rising Revengeance PS3 All DLC

Tested & working on Rebug 4.46 REX, using MultiMan 04.55.1 & reActPSN v3.13

All DLC for MGRR-BLUS31045/NPUB31057
Also comes with region fix to be used with DUPLEX download (MGRR-BLES01750)
and original files from BLUS31045 to convert back from the region fix (DLC will not work with BLES01750)

To install DLC you need use reActPSN to activate the DLC. <a href="
http://www.ps3news.com/ps3-cfw-mfw/reactpsn-v2-23-for-ps3-with-3-41-to-4-30-cfw-support-arrives/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.ps3news.com/ps3-cfw-mfw/reactpsn-v2-23-for-ps3-with-3-41-to-4-30-cfw-support-arrives/</a>

To use MGRR-REGION-FIX just extract the file from rar file & 
put all files into game folder. It will replace: PS3_DISC.SFB, PARAM, & LIC)
Game will now load as BLUS31045, you will have to reinstall game update & game data.
"DO NOT USE IF YOU ARE USING BLUS31045/NPUB31057 GAME VERSION"


File's Included:

    Package Folder:
BLUS31045 Metal Gear Rising - Revengeance - Cyborg Ninja.pkg
BLUS31045 Metal Gear Rising - Revengeance - Inferno Armor.pkg
BLUS31045 Metal Gear Rising - Revengeance - MGS4 Raiden Custom Body.pkg
BLUS31045 Metal Gear Rising - Revengeance - White Armor.pkg
BLUS31045 Metal Gear Rising - Revengeance.pkg
NPUB31057 Metal Gear Rising - Revengeance -Jet Stream Sam Story.pkg

    exdata Folder:
UP0101-NPUB31057_00-MGRDLCARMOR00001.rap
UP0101-NPUB31057_00-MGRDLCARMOR00002.rap
UP0101-NPUB31057_00-MGRDLCARMOR00004.rap
UP0101-NPUB31057_00-MGRDLCARMOR00005.rap
UP0101-NPUB31057_00-MGRDLCSTORY00001.rap
UP0101-NPUB31057_00-MGRDLCVRPACK0001.rap

MGRR-REGION-FIX.rar, Region fix to switch game from BLES01750 to BLUS31045

MGRR - Region Back Up File's, to switch game back to BLES01750 from region fix
